means: 对（数量）估计过高，对…作过高的评价( overestimate的过去式和过去分词 )

sentence.Network_en: They overestimated his ability when they promoted him.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们提拔他的时候高估了他的能力。

sentence.Network_en: The Ministry of Finance consistently overestimated its budget deficits.
sentence.Network_cn: 财政部一贯高估预算赤字.
我们对账单涉及的钱数估计多了.

list.abs: Let " the student elect teachers " , perhaps overestimated the student to distinguish appraises teacher ' s ability ., 让 " 学生选老师 " , 也许高估了学生识别鉴定老师的能力.
This judge is obviously overestimated the significance of the price of FMG ., 如此评判显然是高估了 FMG 价格的意义.
He overestimated his own powers ., 他高估了他自己的权力.
In our moment of triumph ? I think you overestimate their chances ., 在我们胜利的时刻 ﹖ 我看你高估他们的机会了.

entry.tran: 过高估计（数量、重要性等）
entry.def: If you say that someone overestimates something, you mean that they think it is greater in amount or importance than it really is.

example.ex: With hindsight, he was overestimating their desire for peace.
example.tran: 事后看来，他高估了他们对和平的渴望。

entry.def: If you say that something cannot be overestimated, you are emphasizing that you think it is very important.

example.ex: The importance of participating in the life of the country cannot be overestimated...
example.tran: 参与国家生活的重要性再怎么说都不为过。

example.ex: It is hard to overestimate the potential gains from this process.
example.tran: 这一工艺的潜在收益不可估量。

entry.def: If you overestimate someone, you think that they have more of a skill or quality than they really have.

example.ex: I think you overestimate me, Fred.
example.tran: 我认为你高估我了，弗雷德。

auth_sentence.content: Plato overestimated greatly the power of education to reform.
auth_sentence.res_content: Plato overestimated greatly the power of education to reform.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Plato overestimated greatly the power of education to reform.

auth_sentence.content: Ninety-nine per cent of the respondents overestimated their success.
auth_sentence.res_content: Ninety-nine per cent of the respondents overestimated their success.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Ninety-nine per cent of the respondents overestimated their success.

auth_sentence.content: However, this time the climate response has been overestimated.
auth_sentence.res_content: However, this time the climate response has been overestimated.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: However, this time the climate response has been overestimated.

Sentence.sentence: the role of technology in education cannot be overestimated
